content: the court in prato has issued a final resolution in a legal case involving the division of a fourroom flat the court has determined that the property can be divided and has assigned a portion to each party they have also determined the value of each partys share and ordered the corresponding payment the court considered the principles of the civil code and factors affecting the propertys value they discussed options for implementing the division such as allocation sale or drawing lots the court based the propertys value on a valuation report and took into account one partys right of habitation they have ordered the allocation of the property and addressed claims for damages and expenses the costs of the proceedings will be compensated by the parties the court of first instance has made a ruling on the case declaring the claims admissible the court has dissolved the community property and adopted a divisional project the parties will need to pay 50 of €32633240 for their share the court has dismissed the claims made by both parties and ordered them to bear the costs the case will be remitted to the register for a hearing on the divisional project this decision was made on june 6 2022 by the court of prato
